SEARCH
Package com.api.synco.module.course.application.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
com.api.synco.module.course.application.controller.CourseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/courses") public class CourseController extends Object
REST controller for course management operations.

This controller provides endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting courses in the system. Most operations require authentication and ADMIN role.

The controller supports:

  • Course creation (ADMIN only)
  • Course deletion (ADMIN only)
  • Course updates (ADMIN only)
  • Course retrieval by ID
  • Paginated course listing with filters
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Luca5Eckert

    • CourseController

      public CourseController(UserAuthenticationService authenticationService, CourseService courseService)

  • Method Details

    • create

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<CreateCourseResponse>> create(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid CreateCourseRequest createCourseRequest)
      Creates a new course in the system.

      This endpoint requires ADMIN role. The authenticated user must have permission to create new courses.

      Parameters:
      createCourseRequest - the request containing course data
      Returns:
      the created course data with HTTP 201 status

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<Void>> delete(@PathVariable long id)
      Deletes a course from the system.

      This endpoint requires ADMIN role.

      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the course to delete
      Returns:
      success message with HTTP 202 status

    • update

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<UpdateCourseResponse>> update(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateCourseRequest updateCourseRequest, @PathVariable long id)
      Updates an existing course.

      This endpoint requires ADMIN role.

      Parameters:
      updateCourseRequest - the request containing updated course data
      id - the unique identifier of the course to update
      Returns:
      the updated course data with HTTP 202 status

    • getALl

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<List<GetAllCourseResponse>>> getALl(@RequestParam(value="name",required=false) String name, @RequestParam(value="acroym",required=false) String acronym, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int pageNumber, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int pageSize)
      Retrieves a paginated list of courses with optional filters.
      Parameters:
      name - filter by name containing this value (optional)
      acronym - filter by acronym containing this value (optional)
      pageNumber - the page number to retrieve (0-based)
      pageSize - the number of courses per page
      Returns:
      a list of courses matching the criteria

    • get

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse<GetCourseResponse>> get(@PathVariable long id)
      Retrieves a specific course by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the course to retrieve
      Returns:
      the course data with HTTP 200 status
